name: Cosmic Glutton
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam #38 in less than 72 hours.

Theme of minijam: Food
Limitation of minijam:  Only use the arrow keys as input :D

Put yourself in the skin of a brave astronaut and try to survive the strangest catastrophe our universe has ever experienced.

Your space ship computer will help you save more people and obtain enough food. Well, this is all about the food. The food will be your worst oponent and your best friend.  Fire up space engines, charge the lasers and get ready for... cookies!

  • Game created in ct.js. Nice and fresh game engine <3
  • Audio by Kenney. Go check out his assets!
  • English correction by Annie.
  • Beta testing by Vlaxa.
